A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson creates a fantastic journey into the galaxy far\, far away in this film. With excellent character development\, stunning visuals\, and thought-provoking philosophical quandaries\, this film creates depth while still delivering on the Blockbuster fun. Johnson grasps the Star Wars universe and portrays it much more faithfully than J.J. Abrams did in The Force Awakens\, while wrapping up the open ended questions that Abrams left hanging. This film is definitely worth the watch and is a wonderful addition to the Star Wars saga.
